thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Three days in one of my old childhood home towns.
thread.title_full: Three days in one of my old childhood home towns. - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Stephen M L
title: Three days in one of my old childhood home towns.
text:
I went out and searched for the best price on a '3 star' near the airport. This was the best price I found, and so at first I was a little nervous. I had a very nice stay,... I must say. I don't know if I was just tired, but a first I thought it was going to be noisy being next to the tracks. "Nope!." The room was ... "nice", and the bed was great! It was clean and well taken care of in my opinion. It was close to lots of good stores and restaurants, with a mall (Tanforan) an other things close by, like the Millbrae BART station. I had a car so I did not use the train.
Green Features: They have all of the usual environmentally-friendly practices you would expect to see in a hotel that is focused on helping its patrons to be mindful of not being, wasteful.
